name: Hole In The Wall (itch) (azpak)
description:
Hole In The Wall but it has no hole, just collision

Controls

To move the player: Up, Down, Left, Right arrows, or W, S, A, D.
To use poses: E, R, T.
To move camera: Mouse.

Video has a voiceover.

Inspiration: When I decided to make this game I was thinking of a two player racing game where you had a bunch of different poses you had to pick from in order to pass through the walls. However, after a while, I realized that it was pretty hard to create the holes in the walls so I opted for a slightly different idea with a similar feeling.
